code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL});export const boardsApi={getAll:()=>api.get('/boards'),getById:id=>api.get("/boards/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/boards',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/boards/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/boards/".concat(id))};export const listsApi={getByBoardId:boardId=>api.get("/lists/board/".concat(boardId)),getById:id=>api.get("/lists/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/lists',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/lists/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/lists/".concat(id))};export const cardsApi={getByListId:listId=>api.get("/cards/list/".concat(listId)),getById:id=>api.get("/cards/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/cards',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/cards/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/cards/".concat(id))};export const uploadsApi={upload:data=>api.post('/uploads/upload',data),download:fileName=>api.get("/uploads/download/".concat(fileName)),delete:fileName=>api.delete("/uploads/".concat(fileName))};export const commentsApi={getByCardId:cardId=>api.get("/comments/card/".concat(cardId)),create:data=>api.post('/comments',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/comments/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/comments/".concat(id))};export const activityApi={getByCardId:cardId=>api.get("/activity/card/".concat(cardId)),getByBoardId:boardId=>api.get("/activity/board/".concat(boardId)),create:data=>api.post('/activity',data)};export const templatesApi={getAll:()=>api.get('/templates'),getById:id=>api.get("/templates/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/templates',data),createBoard:(id,data)=>api.post("/templates/".concat(id,"/create-board"),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/templates/".concat(id))};export const searchApi={search:params=>api.get('/search',{params}),searchBoards:params=>api.get('/search/boards',{params}),getOverdue:params=>api.get('/search/overdue',{params}),getDueSoon:params=>api.get('/search/due-soon',{params})};
